PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(B) ... brooklet 细流 brooklime 婆婆纳 Brooklyn 布鲁克林.
brookins 布鲁金斯, brooklime 水八角属植物, brooklet 小川
喜伏窝的, 多产的, 多思考的的英文翻译 ... brooklike 小溪般的 brooklime [植]婆婆纳之一种 brook 小溪单词词性&gt.
近似字词-新浪字典 ... brooklet 细流,小河 brooklime 波波纳之一种 broom 扫帚,金雀花扫除.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English  broklemok, from brook + hleomoce, the name of the plant in Old English

means.word_mean: 1. European plant having low-lying stems with blue flowers often pink-flushed; sparsely naturalized in North America
2. plant of western North America and northeastern Asia having prostrate stems with dense racemes of pale violet to lilac flowers
